website_summaries.verdict: This touch-sensitive lamp turns on with a simple tap – great for when your hands are sticky with sauce.
pros: Brightness of 100+ lumens – the same as tactical applications for security guards and police officers
Aluminum handle mount clamp fits rectangular and circular bars as well as most major brands
Built to withstand hot grill covers
cons: May be damaged if you leave it out in the rain
Consider using grill cover or removing after use

customer_reviews.title: Great customer support!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received my light and tested it out, it was acting weird would go on 3 times in a row then stop working. tried different batteries and same result. Then stopped working all together. Emailed them and got a very quick response that they will be sending a replacement and expect it to arrive in a few days. I got it earlier then expected and this one works as described. Very happy. They didn't want the other one back either, though not sure what I will do with a intermittent light..lol. Thanks Cave Tools, great customer support and a real nice light.
customer_reviews.author: Corey J.

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely one of those things that you don't realize you need, until you have one!
customer_reviews.text: This light is brilliant! Fits perfectly on our grill and is exactly what we needed for late night grilling so you can tell if what you are cooking is actually cooked! We've made that mistake before, yuck! Before this light, my husband would use a flashlight or the spotlight from our house. With the spot light, his shadow would always get in the way.. and with the flashlight he never had both hands or I had to stand there for him (like I had nothing better to do!). It's definitely one of those things that you don't realize you need, until you have one! We highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: nicole lee

customer_reviews.title: BBQ Light is what I was looking for but...
customer_reviews.text: The product services me well. The problem I have is the company didn’t respond to my query regarding the touch top switch did not work. It doesn’t dim it is on full on the first tap. This doesn’t bother me. I purchased an additional 2 for a total of 4. Fits well and I doubt that I’d dim it anyway. Purchased 1 for home, 1 for the cabin and 2 for my son-in-laws as Xmas gifts. Still just bad business not to get back. BBQ Light is what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.author: bobfp

customer_reviews.title: Love This Light
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright light. I grill year-round so after dark winter grilling is the norm. This light is better suited for mounting on a gas grill lid handle; something identified in the instruction sheet, but not mentioned in the online product description (deducted a Star for the oversight). I made a mounting post; problem solved. I've tried a number of grill lights over the past decades, and this one is the winner!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: ALL GRILL MASTERS BEHOLD!!
customer_reviews.text: I think that the reviews tell the story. I was surprised how well it lit my cooking surface. Easy to install. Low Profile. I have posted pics for all to enjoy. I would buy again and one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.  Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Promise you won't regret buying this...❤️
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely nice light...very bright...easiest to turn on and off....just slightly touch or slide your finger over the switch area...High quality light and yes Grill light! I'm actually going to order another one to use on my grill because the one I have is on my bed headboard because it works exceptionally well to look at magazines or do any type of reading while laying in bed...I'm sitting here typing and have already found another place I could really use the extra lighting...my laundry room is extremely dark especially where my washer is but not for long...Yes I'm a very happy customer and would definitely recommend it! 😃 The price isn't bad at all...👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: JustBrenna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing- very effective perfect for grilling
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this grill light! My husband is an avid griller, it’s been getting dark pretty early so invested in this light and it’s AMAZING! Very easy to use just pop in some batteries and attach it to your grill. You tap the top when you need it on. It’s very bright and definitely gets the job done. I’ve now referred multiple people to buy it when they see it in use. Great gift as well! Will be buying a few for the holidays. For this price I highly recommend this fun gadget
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: flip and inspect what ever he was grilling was usually pretty comical. I really got some "good wife" brownie ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who loves to grill. It was a tough decision because seeing him try to hold a flash light, open the grill, flip and inspect what ever he was grilling was usually pretty comical. I really got some "good wife" brownie points with this light! He loves it! Shows it off to any friends that are over, even when we aren't grilling and it's not dark! LOL!
customer_reviews.author: TracyAnn

customer_reviews.title: See your food more clearly
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new grill light and my last one was subpar anyways. This one mounted very easily even on my big handle. Light is very easy (maybe a bit too easy) to turn on and off by just touching the logo. The light is very bright and with two bulbs illuminated the grill area nicely. Best thing is that it stays tucked away so that I can leave it mounted with my grill cover in place.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Logan

customer_reviews.title: Failed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three years ago...but never used it. Today I needed light. Put in a brand new set of batteries (tested before installation). It lighted up for a moment, then nothing. No light. Tried to remove the batteries-the door would not come off. It’s going into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Sacramento Simonson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says it does. I like the durability as it sits outside year round (covered) with no problems. Gets dirty easily as it sits in the smoke dump line on the handle, but the tap on/off works nicely. Easy to aim and keep in place.
customer_reviews.author: hike3727

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 of these lights for various members of my family. I liked the fact that you can adjust the brightness by tapping to top of the light which would avoid you from having to touch the light. The light was bright enough to light up the whole grill. Great product for a nice price.
customer_reviews.author: dutorres

customer_reviews.title: ... light to go with my new grill Light work great it wasn't as bright as I was lead to ...
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get my new light to go with my new grill Light work great it wasn't as bright as I was lead to believe. But had enough light to work with. ( used it right away first thing I noticed was a piece of rubble on the mounting handle fell off. Which was no big deal after grilling left light mounted on grill. I woke up and light was on ground the mounting handle had broke off snapped in two pieces very cheap plastic handle) Called amazon they refunded my money and told me to dispose of the light. Will be looking for a new option
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! So glad I bought it. I grill all year round. Really like the quality. Super easy to put on and remove. Love the box for storage. Very happy with it. I used it mostly in the winter when it's been dark outside.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband because he would use the grill in the winter and held a flashlight in his mouth while grilling. This grill light is awesome! We take if off the grill and keep it stored inside mostly because we want to prolong it's life and we live in cold north.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light
customer_reviews.text: Super bright, Large head and does not articulate that well, But it is super bright, best BBQ light for actual light I have had ever.
customer_reviews.author: mecmark

customer_reviews.title: Batteries corrode after a year.
customer_reviews.text: Went to replace the batteries. The screw holding the battery compartment closed is unnecessarily tiny. The batteries were corroded. This thing is completely useless. Do NOT buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: ... attached this light to my BBQ seemed to work fine. The next morning I looked out the window ...
customer_reviews.text: I attached this light to my BBQ seemed to work fine. The next morning I looked out the window and noticed the light fell off the BBQ, What happened was the clamp broke,It's cheap plastic had cracked most likely when I attached it. The light seems to work fine but DON'T OVER-TIGHTEN the clamp. Since my review they sent me a new light.great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: SaltyPdx

customer_reviews.title: SEE food
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the hubby. He said it's perfect for the grill & enables him to see what he's cooking at night. The spotlight is in a spot where it throws a shadow, so this device hit the mark with what he needed!
customer_reviews.author: Nansea33

customer_reviews.title: Product won’t turn off.
customer_reviews.text: The product is well packaged, the product itself is well build, but I can only give 2 stars because it won’t turn off. I have included a video, returned this and bought a tomcare LED light which is 40 lumens brighter.
customer_reviews.author: DavidAndIan

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Bought one as a gift and one for myself. I don’t always need it and have not used it in the rain. Easy to use as well
customer_reviews.author: Dyna309

customer_reviews.title: Light at nivht
customer_reviews.text: With the daylight going away earlier into the fall and the big change the first week of November, you need this to see your grill marks.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Kreson

customer_reviews.title: No more cooking in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: This fits my Weber grill very nicely, and now I can see what I'm doing if I'm cooking near or after sunset. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Having to take it off and reposition for each use is somewhat annoying but the light is so good
customer_reviews.text: Light does the job I wanted it to. A little difficult for me to position although it is very flexible in its settings. Having to take it off and reposition for each use is somewhat annoying but the light is so good, I'll put up with the irritation. "
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and brightness adjustments
customer_reviews.text: I grill year round and in the darker months lighting has always been an issue. This grill light solved those problems. It clamps to the hood handle and flexes to shine bright on the grill surface. Easy on and brightness adjustments, just touch the indicated spot! Easy to set up, even comes with a screw driver for the battery cover. Hand tightened clamp installs the grill light with ease. No more grilling in the dark for me!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Z

customer_reviews.title: Will not turn on
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased and this will not turn on, both my husband and I have tried tapping the logo as instructed, reinstalling the batteries in all possible directions, and no luck. I feel like a crazy person rubbing a genie lamp trying to get it to work...this is defective and going back.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Hofsommer

customer_reviews.title: It was the perfect fix for my lighting issue when I grilled out
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this product. It was the perfect fix for my lighting issue when I grilled out. However the mounting bracket broke within two days of use. The grill lid accidently slammed shut and then snap. I wish this product was a little more sturdy. My advice would be to be somewhat cautious and realize that it is a little more delicate of a product. I still would use a product like this.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Thames

customer_reviews.title: Worked great - for 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Not outdoor-rated or weatherproof. Worked great for 2 months before the weather conditions kicked in. After replacing the batteries a few times, it would randomly turn on (without being touched) and then NOT turn on when you tapped the power button. Another (supposedly) weatherproof light that does not live up to its billing.
customer_reviews.author: Tbags

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long.
customer_reviews.text: Well it was good while it lasted. Don't think this light is really meant to be out in the weather. Couple weeks ago it stopped working and I changed out the batteries again and got nothing so it must be internal. I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: dave decell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, heavy duty light.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to clip onto his big green egg. He says it works perfectly while grilling in the dark months of winter.
customer_reviews.author: kjm

customer_reviews.title: I will by again.
customer_reviews.text: I like the metal clasp handle for handling high temperature and the touch activated switch.
customer_reviews.author: gary fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Very handy. Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: For a grill in a low lit backyard this makes grilling easier!
customer_reviews.author: HannahRenee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. It’s a bright,white light that shines directly onto what you’re cooking. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Leach

customer_reviews.title: Overheated on Grill
customer_reviews.text: Bought this grill light, connected it as instructed to the Grill handle bar. Worked great but ultimately just stopped, apparently from the heat of the grill. Wouldn't expect a grill lamp connected to the grill handle to burn out from excess heat. Very disappointed. Too late to return but wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Albert L. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome BBQ Light
customer_reviews.text: This light covers the entire BBQ Pit area. Very easy to connect to handle
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Benelli

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband BBQs weekly. He loves it and highly recommends it. The food sure tastes good. I notice that he doesn't have to race home after work before it gets dark to grill like he did in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Everything I buy from cave tools is quality !
customer_reviews.text: It works great, haven't used it in the rain but it's nice and bright and lights up eather one my grills ! I'm happy with it !
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Not Water Resistant
customer_reviews.text: This light cannot be out in the rain, which is kind of silly for a grill light. Either do not buy it or plan to put a plastic bag over it when you are not using it. Otherwise you must bring it inside between uses. I left it out in a misting rain, and it turned itself on. I had to bring it inside take the batteries out and let it dry out for 24 hours before it would work again. Hardly water resistant as claimed.
customer_reviews.author: Vienna Spartan

customer_reviews.title: Bright light!
customer_reviews.text: This light is really nice. It works great for the grill. It is very bright and hooks right on the handle of the grill. We have used it several times and it has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ Light
customer_reviews.text: This works great for those after dark BBQ nights. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lenzkes

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light (3 levels even)
customer_reviews.text: Somehow I had always grilled earlier in the day. late afternoon etc. Schedules change and I could not see if the steak was well done or burnt to a crisp. This new light saves the day. It even has 3 levels of light that can be switched with a touch.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the BBQ light, my only complaint is that it does not have adjustable brightness as described in the advertisement, there is only one brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T.

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas. He was very pleased. He attached it to his Traeger grill/smoker to help him see when he is using it under less than full light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Love my Grill Light!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm every time. Perfect for cooking early mornings or late evenings. Easy to attach to the Big Green Egg handle. Illuminates the whole grill.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD OBRIEN

customer_reviews.title: Great Light
customer_reviews.text: I received my grill light quickly and on time. It gives a great range of light and is bright enough to actually help. Some lights I've seen have been dull but this one has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Nava

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for your grill master!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for a brother who loves to grill but doesn’t have an outside light by his grill. Also his nickname is “Captain Caveman” so the name was so fitting I couldn’t resist getting this for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This light is what I have been looking for  it works great
customer_reviews.text: This light is very bright and shows the true colors of the items I am cooking The light also has a wide field so no corner of the bbq is in a shadow
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hunt

customer_reviews.title: The light is nice and bright and turns on
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves this light as we often grill after dark. The light is nice and bright and turns on easy
customer_reviews.author: Judy Tesch

customer_reviews.title: Not rainproof
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright light. Maneuvers easily and attaches to handle. MAKE SURE YOU TAKE IT DOWN AFTER USE.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Jo

customer_reviews.title: When is works correctly it is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this... until we used it twice and the battery died... love the light but how did it go out in less than 3 uses. We actually ordered 2 and one snapped with we installed it b/c it didn't come with all the parts... When is works correctly it is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: baby momma knows

customer_reviews.title: Great light but could use a little more instruction.
customer_reviews.text: Great light, very bright after dark. Mounts to the grill great and is adjustable. The on/off functions were unclear at first but once I figured it out, I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: J. T.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. The on off switch is by tapping the little symbol. Worked for a week, now it wont shut off. Also, you cannot leave it out in the rain or use it in the rain. The water got into the light and its totally done. You think it would be water proof. DO NOT BUY THIS LIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sipos

customer_reviews.title: Light your way with cave tools
customer_reviews.text: Just got my grill light and it's simply amazing. Its a great addition to my outdoor space. Thinking of adding a second one for my charcoal grill.
customer_reviews.author: Saintlouisman

customer_reviews.title: Stripped Threads on second use
customer_reviews.text: The lighting is very good, but the frame is cheaply made. The second time I used the light, the threads for tightening the light to the grill handle stripped. Now I have to hold the light to use it...already had a flashlight that would have worked for that!
customer_reviews.author: Unimpressed with Quality

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, easy to install. Can't wait for winter, so can cook in the dark!
customer_reviews.author: hamguy

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Made well not a cheap light. Left it out in the rain overnight. Dried it off and still working without issue. Very happy with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Brian chord

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this grill light!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My husband tried it out last night and it really lights up the interior of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: it was great, but so disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. We used 2 times and it is no longer working. When it did those 2 times, it was great, but so disappointing. We even brought it inside after each use, which is a pain to screw on and off. If its not waterproof it should utilize a clamp for easy attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: in grill in the nigt
customer_reviews.text: The item is so strong. I liked because the item is solid and perfect for work. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Queiroz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied guy for seeing what he's grilling and happy lady he's not accidentally grilling himself 😂very bright and sturdy✔✔
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We end up doing quite a bit of grilling from dusk to dark, so this light is a great addition. Plus the touch on and off is a great feature!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Grill Light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend for Xmas and he LOVES it. He was very impressed with the design and the power of the brightness. Nice product! Now I might have to have one too.
customer_reviews.author: VinoSucker

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Its not a bad light for the price just got it now let's see how it hi holds up
customer_reviews.author: Harold cummings sr

customer_reviews.title: great BBQ light
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many BBQ lights for my husband but it was never the "right"one". This one did the trick . He loves it. Lights up the entire BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: ag

customer_reviews.title: My husband absolutely loved this gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loved this gift! A wonderful gift for the man who likes to grill in the winter time when it is dark outside.
customer_reviews.author: Believer14

customer_reviews.title: BBQ grill light works great
customer_reviews.text: This light was easy to install and emits a nice bright light. It saves me from always having to turn on my patio light for a late night burger. Seems to be a thoughtful well made product.
customer_reviews.author: steve sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Faulty on/off touch button
customer_reviews.text: Light turns on and won't shut off or won't turn on at all after having it for less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light! 3 settings and very bright on the highest.
customer_reviews.author: vicki thomas

customer_reviews.title: 7 months of use and clamp broke off
customer_reviews.text: Light is great so i can't fault that at all. I like the interface but the clamp broke off after less than 7 months of use. Made out of weak plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Aviator

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my father for Christmas. He says it works great and was easy to attach to grill.
customer_reviews.author: meagan

customer_reviews.title: It does work well. It clips on well. ...
customer_reviews.text: It does work well. It clips on well. I'm not so sure about the whole "luxurious" part of the gift box.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Memory

customer_reviews.title: Light is bright enough, stand off not long enough to clamp to grill and shine on work area
customer_reviews.text: Stand off on clamp was not long enough to clamp to grill handle and shine on work area. I have a pit boss pellet grill, common enough
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill light.
customer_reviews.text: Love it now that I have no problem grilling on those dark winter nights. I have left it attached to my grill and then covered.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan W. Stoeckel

customer_reviews.title: At first my husband liked this light
customer_reviews.text: At first my husband liked this light. Then the clip broke. He glued it. Then he got annoyed at having to screw and unscrew the light from the grill since it is not water proof. The company sent me another one. I gave it to my dad. He also doesn't use the light due to its impractle clipping mechanism. Bummer. The packaging is cool though.
customer_reviews.author: jessica a.

customer_reviews.title: Cool lamp, nice & bright.
customer_reviews.text: What a cool light!! It’s super bright. I clamped it onto our grill canopy frame and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grilling.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. East install, on/off. Only “downside” it’s so bright it will continuely show you how bad your grates need cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: Never be in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: “Great gift for everyone. Makes grilling easier at night. We grill all year long, so during the time change it gets dark earlier. Highly recommend. Fits my Weber Genesis perfect. "
customer_reviews.author: M MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Lights up my grill
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly on the handle of my grill. The light is very bright
customer_reviews.author: Keith Day

customer_reviews.title: Amazing so far!
customer_reviews.text: We're not sure about water resistance yet, but so far my brother-in-law loves this light! Super bright, versatile, and seems to be made very well! Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: This Guy

customer_reviews.title: It is great! You can direct the strong light beam
customer_reviews.text: It is great! You can direct the strong light beam, fits perfectly on grill handle and my grill master (husband) is happy.
customer_reviews.author: j hill

customer_reviews.title: Love the Light
customer_reviews.text: Love the grill light I purchased. I originally purchased 1 for my own birthday present and liked it so much I purchased another for my son-in-law. I especially like the ability to change the brightness using the 3 settings and the ease of attaching and detaching from my grill. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Well built and fits nicely. Nothing bad to say about this light.
customer_reviews.text: Nice light. Love the touch to turn on feature. Fits the Weber Silver Genesis with the large diameter handle well!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This light lasted for approximately 10 uses, none of which were lengthy, before the light went very dim and is really useless now. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Fits my grill handle and I love the ability to control the brightness
customer_reviews.text: It is EXACTLY what I was looking for. Fits my grill handle and I love the ability to control the brightness. Thank you - - - great product
customer_reviews.author: Ed F

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This light has survived a Oregon winter with 12" of snow and freezing rain. The button is a little to sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Busch

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this everytime I grill out at my apartment complex. It's super easy to use. I like it b/c you are able to lock it on and take it off at ease.
customer_reviews.author: Seth D. Weiner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I bought them as a gift and they loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Farrer

customer_reviews.title: Good product does what it is advertised to do.
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for my son. He loves it said it worked well and was easy to use. Stated the light was very bright an covered the grill area very well.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Works great and does not fall off of BBQ Lid easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and does not fall off of BBQ Lid easy to use to.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: it was a birthday gift 🎁 husband likes it very bright for out 🚪
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this as he cooks in the dark a lot and relies on this light to be able to see what he's cooking
customer_reviews.author: Hoffeld

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light. We didn't know how bright this light round be. But, we are so impressed with the 3 light settings.

customer_reviews.title: Good light, still works well, illuminates the grill really well.
customer_reviews.text: Well it works well and so far seems to be heat tolerant and weather resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Brick Wall

customer_reviews.title: Not so waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It says waterproof, but mine filled with water and no longer works. Cave Tools, any chance of a refund or new unit?
customer_reviews.author: BHF

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright, but easy to bump the touch pad and turn the light on during the day...there go your batteries! Have used it when it was pretty dark out and it was a help.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bricknell

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Missing the screw driver that was suppose to come with to get to battery compartment. 🤬
customer_reviews.author: RHONDA BANKS

customer_reviews.title: Love this Grill Light!!!!
customer_reviews.text: “ Awesome light, and the packaging was great for a gift "
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bright enough.
customer_reviews.text: We like this, but even with the 3 brightness selections it's not really all that bright.

customer_reviews.title: great bang for your buck!!

customer_reviews.title: It's very easy to attach to the grill handle and the light ...
customer_reviews.text: I am excited about this light. I bought it for my husband because we tend to grill late in the evening. It's very easy to attach to the grill handle and the light is more than bright enough to see while you are grilling. Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gordon

product_meta.title: Cave Tools Barbecue Grill Light - Luxurious Gift Box - Upgraded Handle Mount Fits Round & Square Bars on Any BBQ Pit - 10 LED for Grilling at Night - Best Lighting Accessories
feature_bullets: *** INSTANT 10% SAVINGS ON PURCHASE OF 2 OR MORE *** MAXIMUM VISIBILITY - Brightness settings provide 100 + Lumens which is the same lite used in tactical applications for security guards, police and fireman - Great gift idea for mom or dad

FITS ANY HANDLE - Upgraded Aluminum handle mount clamp WILL NOT BREAK and fits on rectangular and circular bars on any Weber Traeger Genesis Big Green Egg Smoker or any other grilling brand. Can also be used for bike lighting or any other flashlight needs
WATER & HEAT RESISTANT - Built to withstand hot temperatures on the grill cover and nighttime grilling in the rain
COMES WITH 25 PROFESSIONAL BARBECUE RECIPES - step by step instructions and detailed grilling tutorial videos - Free Download Meat Smoking Journal iOS & Android App
LIFETIME SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - If at any point you are unhappy with your barbeque grill light you can return it for a full money back refund. We Take Customer Service That Seriously
